item.name: Authentication

Display Registration View

Show the registration view for new users to create an account.

Handle Registration Request

Validate the registration details and create a new user account.

response.body: Redirect response to the company registration route.

item.name:
Display User Registration View

Show the registration view for users who have received a registration token.

Handle User Registration Request

Validate the registration details and complete the registration process for the user.

response.body: Redirect response to the dashboard.

item.name:
Show Login Form

Display the login form to the user.

Handle Authentication Request

Authenticate the user and redirect to the intended location or dashboard.

response.body: Redirect response to the intended route.

item.name:
Display Password Reset Link Request View

Show the view where users can request a password reset link.

Handle Password Reset Link Request

Validate the email address and handle the request to send a password reset link.

response.body: Redirect response back to the previous page with a status message.

item.name:
Display Password Reset View

Show the password reset view to the user, prefilled with email and token.

Handle New Password Request

Validate and handle the request to reset the user's password.

response.body: Redirect response to the login route with a status message.

item.name:
Display Email Verification Prompt

Display the email verification prompt if the user's email is not verified,
otherwise redirect to the dashboard.

response.body: Redirect response to the dashboard if the email is verified.

item.name:
Mark Email as Verified

Mark the authenticated user's email address as verified.
If the email is already verified, redirect to the dashboard with a `verified` query parameter.
If the email is not verified, mark it as verified and trigger the Verified event.

variable.description: The ID of the verify email.

response.body: Redirect response to the dashboard with a `verified` query parameter.

item.name:
Send Email Verification Notification

Send a new email verification notification to the user if their email is not verified.

response.body: Redirect response back to the previous page with a status message.

item.name:
Show Confirm Password View

Display the view for confirming the user's password.

Confirm User's Password

Validate the user's password to confirm their identity.

response.body: Redirect response to the intended route.

item.name:
Update User's Password

Validate and update the user's password.

response.body: Redirect response back to the previous page.

item.name:
Logout and Destroy Session

Logout the authenticated user and destroy the session.

response.body: Redirect response to the home page.

item.name: Categories

Get All Categories

Retrieve a list of all categories.
Company

Get Company Information

Retrieve detailed information about the authenticated user's company, including its organization type and country.
Company Registration

Display the company registration view.

Retrieve all organizations and countries, and render the `Logged/Registration/Company` view.
The view includes lists of organizations and countries for user selection.

Handle the creation of a new company.

Validate the provided company details and create a new company entry in the database.
Update the authenticated user's company ID and registration step.

response.body: Redirect response to the route for registering risks.

item.name: Company Risks

Display the risks registration view.

Fetch and process risks based on the organization type of the authenticated user's company.
The risks are grouped by category, and categories are aggregated with their respective risk counts.
The view also includes the company's existing risks and the current registration step of the user.

Store a new risk or update an existing one.

If the risk already exists, its evaluations and records are deleted. Otherwise, a new risk is created and evaluated.
The method validates the input and creates or updates the company risk and its evaluation.

response.body: Redirect response to the previous page.

item.name:
Display a list of risks associated with the authenticated user's company.

Retrieves all company risks related to the company of the currently authenticated user.
Includes related data such as risk details, categories, and evaluations.

Display the detailed view of a specific company risk.

Retrieves the detailed information of a company risk based on the provided risk ID.
Includes related data such as the author, category, evaluations, precursors, responsible individuals,
reduction plan tasks, and emergency plan actions associated with the risk.

Get Company Risks

Retrieve a list of all risks associated with the authenticated user's company.

Store a New Risk

Create a new risk for the authenticated user's company and evaluate it.

Update Risk Information

Update details of an existing risk, including category, title, description, and evaluation frequency.

body.raw: {"title":"nihil","description":"Aut officia et est molestiae quasi sed ex provident.","category":[],"frequency":4.4}

item.name:
Update Risk Strategy

Update the strategy associated with a specific risk.
Dashboard

Display the company dashboard with risk evaluations and statistics.

Retrieves and processes data to display on the dashboard, including:
- Total number of risks
- Categorization of risks into low, moderate, and critical based on their evaluations
- Recent evaluations with the highest criticality
- Detailed information about the most critical risks
Reduction Plans

Store Reduction Plans Task

Create a new task associated with a risk reduction plan.

Update Reduction Plans

Update the status and optional remark of a specific task.

Delete a Task

Delete a specific task by its ID.
Risk Emergency Plan

Display the emergency plan execution view for a specific risk.

Retrieves and displays the emergency plan details for the specified risk.
If the `emergencyPlanStatus` of the risk is 0 (not executed), redirects to the dashboard.

variable.description: The ID of the emergency plan.

header.value: XSRF-%3D; expires=Tue, 06 Aug 2024 13:54:45 GMT; Max-Age=7200; path=/; samesite=lax; intuitrisks_%3D; expires=Tue, 06 Aug 2024 13:54:45 GMT; Max-Age=7200; path=/; httponly; samesite=lax

response.body: {"message":"Unauthenticated."}

item.name:
Update the responsible agent for a specific emergency plan action.

Validates the request for task ID and responsible agent ID,
then updates the responsible agent for the specified emergency plan action.

variable.description: The ID of the emergency plan.

item.name:
Mark the emergency plan of a specific risk as executed.

Updates the `emergencyPlanStatus` of the specified risk to 1 (executed).
Redirects the user back to the dashboard.

variable.description: The ID of the emergency plan.

item.name:
Mark the emergency plan of a specific risk as started.

Updates the `emergencyPlanStatus` of the specified risk to 2 (started).

variable.description: The ID of the emergency plan.

item.name:
Mark the emergency plan of a specific risk as ended.

Updates the `emergencyPlanStatus` of the specified risk to 0 (ended),
and resets all associated emergency plan actions.

variable.description: The ID of the emergency plan.

item.name:
Mark a specific emergency plan action as done.

Validates the request for action ID, then updates the action status to 1 (done).

variable.description: The ID of the emergency plan.

item.name:
Provide a response for a specific emergency plan action.

Validates the request for action ID and response text,
then updates the action's response field.

variable.description: The ID of the emergency plan.

item.name:
Store Risk Emergency Plan Actions

Store new risk emergency plan actions and delete specified actions.
Risk Evaluation

Update the evaluation of an existing risk.

Validate and update the risk evaluation details for the given risk ID.

response.body: No content.

item.name:
Store a new risk evaluation for a company.

Validates the incoming request data to ensure that all required fields are present and within valid ranges.
Creates a new `CompanyRiskEvaluation` instance with the provided risk ID, probability, and impact values,
and associates it with the currently authenticated user.
Risk Precursors

Store Precursors

Add new precursors for a company risk.

Delete Precursors

Delete specified precursors by their IDs.

Update Precursor Status

Update the status of a specific precursor.
Risks

Display a list of risks.

Retrieve all risks with their associated categories and organization types.
Return the data to be rendered on the `IntuitRisks/Risks` view.

Handle the creation of a new risk.

Validate the provided risk details and create a new risk entry in the database.
Associate the risk with the specified organization types.

response.body: Redirect response back to the previous page with input.

item.name:
Handle the updating of an existing risk.

Validate the provided risk details and update the existing risk entry in the database.
If no name is provided, toggle the active status of the risk instead.
Update the associated organization types for the risk.

response.body: Redirect response back to the previous page with input.

item.name: User Registration

Update the user's registration step to the next phase.

Sets the user's registration step to 3 to indicate progress in the registration process.

response.body: No content.

item.name: Users

Display the user's profile form.

Renders the profile edit page with information about whether the user's email must be verified
and any status messages from the session.

header.value: XSRF-%3D; expires=Tue, 06 Aug 2024 13:54:45 GMT; Max-Age=7200; path=/; samesite=lax; intuitrisks_%3D; expires=Tue, 06 Aug 2024 13:54:45 GMT; Max-Age=7200; path=/; httponly; samesite=lax

response.body: {"message":"Unauthenticated."}

item.name:
Delete the user's account.

Validates that the provided password is correct, then logs out the user,
deletes the user's account, and invalidates and regenerates the session.
Redirects to the homepage after the account is deleted.
Get Company Users

request.description: Retrieve all users for the authenticated user's company.

response.body: {"message":"Unauthenticated."}
